sfdmu:run.description: Starts the execution of the migration job using the SFDX Data Move Utility Plugin (SFDMU).

json.name: json
json.description: [Optional] Format the command output as json

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: [Optional] File logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: [Optional] Overrides the api version set in the export.json definition

sourceusername.name: sourceusername
sourceusername.description: Source org username/alias or 'csvfile' for csv load

path.name: path
path.description: [Optional] Absolute/relative path to the directory containing export.json file

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: [Optional] Emits full command output to stdout

concise.name: concise
concise.description: [Optional] Emits brief command output to stdout

version.name: version
version.description: [Optional] Prints the current version of the command

noprompt.name: noprompt
noprompt.description: [Optional] Suppresses prompting the user for input or confirmation

canmodify.name: canmodify
canmodify.description: [Optional] Allows modification of target production environment without preliminary prompting the user about it.

usesf.name: usesf
usesf.description: [Optional] Enables the usage of modern Salesforce CLI (sf-cli) commands instead of deprecated Salesforce DX CLI (sfdx-cli) commands.

logfullquery.name: logfullquery
logfullquery.description: [Optional] Enables logging of full SOQL queries
